definitions.definition: A roughly hemispherical container used to hold, mix or present food, such as salad, fruit or soup, or other items.
As much as is held by a bowl.
examples: You can’t have any more soup – you’ve had three bowls already.

definitions.definition: ( cooking ) A dish comprising a mix of different foods, not all of which need be cooked, served in a bowl.
examples: This restaurant offers a number of different bowls .

definitions.definition: A haircut in which straight hair is cut at an even height around the edges, forming a bowl shape.
The round hollow part of anything.
examples: Direct the cleaning fluid around the toilet bowl and under the rim.

subdefinitions.definition: The part of a spoon that holds content , as opposed to the handle .
Part of a pipe , bong , or other smoking implement that holds the material to be burned.
The quantity of burnable content to be consumed in a pipe or bong.
( typography ) A rounded portion of a glyph that encloses empty space, as in the letters d and o.

definitions.definition: ( geography ) A round crater (or similar) in the ground.
( sports , theater ) An elliptical-shaped stadium or amphitheater resembling a bowl.
( American football ) A postseason football competition, a bowl game (i.e. Rose Bowl , Super Bowl )

main_definition: A roughly hemispherical container used to hold, mix or present food, such as salad, fruit or soup, or other items.
secondary_definitions: As much as is held by a bowl.
( cooking ) A dish comprising a mix of different foods, not all of which need be cooked, served in a bowl.
A haircut in which straight hair is cut at an even height around the edges, forming a bowl shape.
The round hollow part of anything.
( geography ) A round crater (or similar) in the ground.
( sports , theater ) An elliptical-shaped stadium or amphitheater resembling a bowl.
( American football ) A postseason football competition, a bowl game (i.e. Rose Bowl , Super Bowl )

definitions.definition: The ball rolled by players in the game of lawn bowls .
The action of bowling a ball.

main_definition: ( bowls ) The ball rolled by players in the game of lawn bowls .
secondary_definitions: ( sports ) The action of bowling a ball.
